entry.title: nothing's wrong when nothing's true
entry.summary:
Author: troiax

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,332Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 11

Summary: "And then Bruce is being super weird and uptight recently, and he’s constantly on League missions, and it made me wonder if he’s working too much. Maybe.”“And that has to do with Clark how?”“Who’s in charge of planning and strategy in the league?”Kara’s eyes widened. “Fuck. It’s your dad’s fault.” Or: Bruce and Clark don't like the way Dick and Kara are working. Dick and Kara attempt to distract them so they can work the case their way. It goes about as well as expected.

entry.title: the redhead (and kryptonian) curse
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,967Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 64

Summary: Damian can't help but notice that Kon-El is not a redhead. In fact, he has black hair. So he is different, as far as the redhead curse goes. Drake is likely immune to it as well. Which means that Damian will remain unaffected when his time comes, unlike his older brothers and their apparent weakness towards redheads. Only... soon, he finds out there's a new curse haunting the family. It's not the redhead or the freckled one. Oh, how he wish it was. But no, this new one is far more dangerous.   (Or, the Waynes have a type. And likely are cursed. Damian's sure of that.)

entry.title: Devour Me
entry.summary:
Author: TPWK28HS

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,966Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 46

Summary: That night, Bruce Wayne didn’t just lose his parents… he also lost the ability to taste anything. He awakened as a Folk: nothing fills him, nothing can satisfy the emptiness inside. The Joker takes every chance to tempt him, but his flavor, though intense, is so cloying and nauseating that it pushes Bruce to the edge, making him hate Cakes. Until he tastes him.Clark Kent. A reporter who, by accident, reveals himself to be a Cake. But not just any Cake: to Bruce, he’s addictive, igniting him instantly and leaving him with a single desire… to devour him again. Clark promises to keep the secret, but he runs. Bruce won’t allow it. From that moment on, Kent becomes his obsession. Yet Clark, despite all his empathy, hides an even greater secret: he must conceal that he is Superman. He tries to escape this dangerous game, but when his family’s farm is at risk, Bruce offers him a deal he can’t refuse: save it… in exchange for becoming his sustenance. A convenient arrangement… or the beginning of a bond that will devour everything?

entry.title: Gotham by Starlight
entry.summary:
Author: brmqtr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,248Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: For once, Gotham forgets to scream. No sirens, no crimes, no chaos — just silence, and a city unsure how to rest. Bruce Wayne doesn’t trust it for a second. Clark Kent decides that’s exactly why they should enjoy it. Dragged from the Batcave and onto a rooftop dinner date, Batman reluctantly discovers what peace looks like when shared with the man who carries the sky. Between overanalyzed dumplings, melted takeout, and confessions under unexpected starlight, the world’s finest heroes learn that even in Gotham, love can sound like laughter. When dawn comes, Bruce doesn’t retreat into the shadows — for once, he stays.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply

entry.title: Sun Starved
entry.summary:
Author: Fish_stik

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,480Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Bruce had just been patrolling one night. That's all. Nothing world-ending (not that Alfred knew about his nightly ventures—which itself might be Bruce-ending), and yet here he was. Dragged to some backwater summer camp for "half-bloods" by a young woman after helping her fight off some weird meta thug, where everyone took Ancient Greek myths far too seriously. Don't get him wrong, he loved those stories; he basically grew up on them, but there was no way that this was all real.   Like, come on... A half-horse activities director? Magical strawberry fields? It was all too much, and that was coming from the guy from a city overrun with metas and who lived right next door to the place with an alien as its hero. Though Bruce didn't know or even trust the guy (?), Superman made far more sense than these demigods.  Bruce fights a minotaur with Diana and gets dragged to Camp Half-Blood, where he then finds out he’s a demigod, makes a very attractive friend, and finds out the sun has been stolen. What a killer summer…

entry.title: one day i am gonna grow wings (this is how it feels to take the fall)
entry.summary:
Author: no_imnotafraidtodisappear

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,896Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 118

Summary: Neil Josten wasn’t stupid.Neil Josten knew how to nurse himself back to health after that night in January. He made his own suits, he made his own webs. Neil Josten put his life back together piece by piece, all by himself.Neil Josten had survived.Even so Neil Josten knew he should’ve kept running. Neil Josten should’ve known his time was running out. Neil Josten should’ve heeded his mother’s advice instead of sticking out like a sore thumb, even with his mask on.No, Neil Josten wasn’t stupid. Neil Josten was dumb.——————————————————Neil has been Spider-man (and alone) for quite sometime. One mission goes sideways and New York's not-so-friendly Spider-man dies. Neil wakes up in New Jersey... in another universe. Many problems arise.Please mind the tags. There will be some graphic stuff. I try to put TWs at the beginning of the chapter, though. You have been warned. Slow updates. this fic is inspired by both of these fics:Hope Was A Dangerous, Disquieting Thing by BisexualChaosDemonLeap of Faith by alighterwood and ErinWantsToWrite

entry.title: Eat Your Heart Out
entry.summary:
Author: jessequicksters

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,920Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: “Teeth,” Clark says, to Bruce’s icy grey stare. “You’ll have to watch the teeth.” “You do know who you’re talking to right now.” Clark’s gaze instinctively locks onto his mouth as he responds, barely perceptible under the shadow of the cowl. Clark doesn’t need the moonlight to see all of that, of course. He’s never needed it to see any part of Bruce, including the pointed fangs he had been eyeing up from the second he parted his lips. “I think I can handle the teeth,” Bruce says.

entry.title: Your Love is Sunlight
entry.summary:
Author: Floof_likes_fluff

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,787Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Clark has been dating Bruce, millionaire playboy for the past 2 years but he slowly can't take feeling like Bruce's side piece. He knows Bruce loves him, but their relationship can't go on if Bruce even refuses to call what they have a relationship. So, they break up. Or well, they would if they were in a romantic relationship and not "friends". Years later and the two have moved on, or have they really? After some misunderstandings and some fights, Superman and Batman have developed a type of friendship, or well at least an appreciation. Together, they formed the Justice League and while not often, from time to time, they are on monitoring duty together at the Watchtower.
